anya-e1001n4:8: Atipiyo na kātabbo, khalo kotuhalaṃ karo;
anya-e1001n4:11: Sappo duṭṭho khalo duṭṭho, sappā duṭṭhataro khalo;
anya-e1001n4:14: Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tenaso;
anya-e1001n4:15: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve bāloti vuccati.
anya-e1001n4:17: Madhūva maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
anya-e1001n4:18: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, atha dukkhaṃ nigacchati.
anya-e1001n4:20: Na sādhu balavā bālo, sāhasā vindate dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n4:23: Ghare duṭṭho mūsiko ca, vane duṭṭho ca vānaro;
anya-e1001n4:24: Sakuṇe ca duṭṭho kāko, nareduṭṭho ca brāhmaṇo.
anya-e1001n4:26: Dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṃ santassa yojanaṃ;
anya-e1001n4:32: Nattadosaṃ pare jaññā, jaññā dosaṃ parassatu;
anya-e1001n4:38: Yathā udumbarapakkā, bahi rattakā eva ca;
anya-e1001n4:42: Na so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā.
anya-e1001n4:45: Ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
anya-e1001n4:50: Dujjanena samaṃ veraṃ, sakhyañcāpi na kāraye;
anya-e1001n4:51: Uṇho dahati caṅgāro, sīto kaṇhāyate karaṃ.
anya-e1001n4:54: Madhu tiṭṭhati jivhagge, hadaye halāhalaṃ visaṃ.
anya-e1001n4:57: Maṇinā bhūsito sappo, kimeso na bhayaṅkaro.
anya-e1001n4:62: Yathāpi pana sapakkā, bahi kaṇṭakameva ca;
anya-e1001n4:71: Upadeso hi mūḷhānaṃ, pakopāya na santiyā.
anya-e1001n4:73: Na ṭhātabbaṃ na gantabbaṃ, dujjanena samaṃ kvaci;
anya-e1001n4:74: Dujjano hi dukkhaṃ deti, na so sukhaṃ kadācipi.
anya-e1001n4:76: Abaddhā tattha bajjhanti, yattha bālā pabhāsare;
anya-e1001n4:77: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare.
anya-e1001n4:89: Hitakkaro paro bandhu, bandhupi ahito paro;
anya-e1001n4:102: Rājadvāre susāne ca, yo tiṭṭhati so bandhavā.
anya-e1001n4:104: Na 2 vissase amittassa, mittañcāpi na vissase;
anya-e1001n4:107: Mātā mittaṃ pitā ceti, sabhāvā taṃ tayaṃ hitaṃ;
anya-e1001n4:110: Āpadāsu mittaṃ jaññā, yuddhe sūraṃ iṇe suciṃ;
anya-e1001n4:111: Bhariyaṃ khīṇesu vittesu, byasanesu ca bandhavaṃ.
anya-e1001n4:113: Sakiṃ duṭṭhañca yo mittaṃ, puna sandhātumicchati;
anya-e1001n4:117: Punappunaṃ vivaḍḍhanti, tasmā sesaṃ na kāraye.
anya-e1001n4:120: Tādisaṃ no paseveyya, hadaye tu halāhalaṃ.
anya-e1001n4:122: Na seve pharusaṃ sāmiṃ, na ca seveyya macchariṃ;
anya-e1001n4:123: Tato apaggaṇha sāmiṃ, neva niggahitaṃ tato.
anya-e1001n4:131: Ahitā paṭisedho ca, hitesu ca payojanaṃ;
anya-e1001n4:134: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:135: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n4:137: Piyo garu bhāva nīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:138: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
anya-e1001n4:146: Piyo garu bhāvaniyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:147: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n4:149: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:150: Gambhirañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
